name: Back to the fut.. school?
description:
Doc. sent me back to school with the time capsule, he absoutly wants his candies..
Well.. I should pass trough the bombs if i want to survive in this tough place that is School!

Controls :

Up arrow key = Jump
Down arrow key = Slide

Credits :

Sprites by Zatrof.
Code by Elymë.

Musics : https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles

A Mini Jam 9 project!
Realised in 60 hours.
Theme : Back to school.
